name: Duke Nukem: Land of the Babes
name_original: Duke Nukem: Land of the Babes
description:
Using a time portal device, the UBR tracked down Duke and made his choice very simple, help them now or there would be no chicks in the future. Being the chivalrous hero that he is, Duke promptly signed up to help the babes. With a huge new arsenal of destructive weapons and a legion of sinister enemies, DUKE NUKEM - LAND OF THE BABES is heart-pounding Duke action at its most savage. The king has arrived and it's time to kick some ass.

Duke Nukem: Land of the Babes is a third-person shooter video game in the Duke Nukem series of video games. This game is a direct sequel to the 1998 title Duke Nukem: Time to Kill.
